description:
When you inflict harm on another player's character, **they** get +1Hx with you on their sheet.
When you hurt someone, they see you more clearly.

When you heal or give medical aid to another player's character, you get +1Hx with them on
your sheet. When you heal someone, you see them more clearly

When you make a highly interruptible move, announce that you're making it and explicitly give everyone a chance to interrupt you. Otherwise, they can call a do-over and retroactively interrupt you if they want, even after play's continued on.
